SEARCH
Package cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
cli.CLI
public class CLI extends Object
Command Line Interface (CLI) for interacting with the MyFoodora system. This class provides a text-based interface for users to perform various operations such as logging in, registering, and managing orders.
Author:
Aymane Adib, Alisson Bonatto

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to start the CLI application. It initializes the MyFoodora system and provides a welcome message. Users can enter commands to interact with the system.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments (not used)

    • initialization

      public static void initialization()
      Initializes the MyFoodora system and performs any necessary setup. This method can be extended to include additional initialization logic.

    • welcomeMessage

      public static void welcomeMessage()
      Displays a welcome message and instructions for using the CLI. This method provides an overview of available commands and how to interact with the system.

    • printGenericHelp

      public static void printGenericHelp()
      Prints the generic help message with available commands. This method provides an overview of commands that can be used by any user type.

    • printCourierHelp

      public static void printCourierHelp()
      Prints the help message for the Courier user type. This method can be extended to include specific commands and instructions for couriers.

    • printRestaurantHelp

      public static void printRestaurantHelp()
      Prints the help message for the Restaurant user type. This method can be extended to include specific commands and instructions for restaurants.

    • printCustomerHelp

      public static void printCustomerHelp()
      Prints the help message for the Customer user type. This method can be extended to include specific commands and instructions for customers.

    • printManagerHelp

      public static void printManagerHelp()
      Prints the help message for the Manager user type. This method can be extended to include specific commands and instructions for managers.

    • print

      public static void print(String message)
      Prints a message to the console, prefixed with the current user's username if available. This method is used for displaying messages in a user-friendly format.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be printed

    • exit

      public static void exit()
      Exits the CLI application.

    • setup

      public static void setup(String... args)
      Creates random users based on quantities specified by the user.
      Parameters:
      args - the quantities of each user to be created : restaurantQuantity, customerQuantity, courierQuantity

    • login

      public static void login(String... args)
      Handles user login by processing the provided username and password. This method can be extended to include authentication logic.
      Parameters:
      args - the username and password for login

    • showMoneySpent

      public static void showMoneySpent(String... args)
      Displays the total amount of money spent by the customer on orders. If a restaurant name is provided, it shows the total spent at that specific restaurant.
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments for showing money spent, such as restaurant name

    • onDuty

      public static void onDuty()
      Marks the courier as on duty, allowing them to accept orders.

    • offDuty

      public static void offDuty(String... args)
      Marks the courier as off duty, preventing them from accepting new orders.
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments for going off duty, such as courier ID
